title: The Post
plotOutline: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.

title: Home Alone
plotOutline: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas eve.

title: Mulan
plotOutline: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: Remember the Titans
plotOutline: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

title: The Last Revenants
plotOutline: A great plague has eradicated all vampires from the planet except for four lone female survivors of the species. They must integrate into society or risk extinction.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
plotOutline: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

title: Titanic
plotOutline: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Mud
plotOutline: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
plotOutline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

title: Fences
plotOutline: A working-class African-American father tries to raise his family in the 1950s, while coming to terms with the events of his life.

title: Cinderella
plotOutline: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Coco
plotOutline: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Bambi
plotOutline: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

title: Zero Dark Thirty
plotOutline: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

title: Lone Survivor
plotOutline: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

title: Toy Story Treats
plotOutline: A series of short vignettes featuring the characters from the first "Toy Story" film.

title: True Grit
plotOutline: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

title: Cast Away
plotOutline: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Inception
plotOutline: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Dunkirk
plotOutline: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: The Mighty Ducks
plotOutline: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

image_url: movie-covers/Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy.jpg
title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
plotOutline: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

title: The Martian
plotOutline: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

title: Fury
plotOutline: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

title: Step Brothers
plotOutline: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

title: BlacKkKlansman
plotOutline: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

title: Interstellar
plotOutline: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Book of Eli
plotOutline: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

title: Avatar
plotOutline: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Aladdin
plotOutline: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: The Fundamentals of Caring
plotOutline: A man suffering a family loss enrolls in a class about care-giving that changes his perspective on life.

title: Cars
plotOutline: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town, and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

title: Blood Diamond
plotOutline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

title: Braveheart
plotOutline: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Mudbound
plotOutline: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.

title: Apollo 13
plotOutline: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

title: Monsters, Inc.
plotOutline: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: Space Jam
plotOutline: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

title: The Lion King
plotOutline: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Finding Dory
plotOutline: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

title: Beauty and the Beast
plotOutline: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: The Other Guys
plotOutline: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

title: Finding Nemo
plotOutline: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Sicario
plotOutline: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plotOutline: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Little Mermaid
plotOutline: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

title: Moneyball
plotOutline: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

title: Hell or High Water
plotOutline: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

title: Everest
plotOutline: The story of New Zealand mountaineer Rob Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.

title: Gold
plotOutline: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

title: Lawless
plotOutline: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

title: The Social Network
plotOutline: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
plotOutline: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.

title: Toy Story 3
plotOutline: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: The Sandlot
plotOutline: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

title: The Last Samurai
plotOutline: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: Sahara
plotOutline: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

title: Game Night
plotOutline: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

title: Toy Story 2
plotOutline: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: The Patriot
plotOutline: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Lilo & Stitch
plotOutline: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

title: Super 8
plotOutline: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

title: Encanto
plotOutline: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: Hostiles
plotOutline: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

title: American Made
plotOutline: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

title: The Adjustment Bureau
plotOutline: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
plotOutline: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: American Sniper
plotOutline: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
plotOutline: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

title: Up
plotOutline: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Captain Phillips
plotOutline: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: Free Willy
plotOutline: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

title: Top Gun
plotOutline: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

title: Catch Me If You Can
plotOutline: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: The Truman Show
plotOutline: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Notting Hill
plotOutline: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

title: 50 First Dates
plotOutline: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

title: Rookie of the Year
plotOutline: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

title: Greyhound
plotOutline: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

title: Failure to Launch
plotOutline: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

image_url: movie-covers/10 Things I Hate About You.jpg
title: 10 Things I Hate About You
plotOutline: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

title: The Proposal
plotOutline: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

image_url: movie-covers/Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope.jpg
title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
plotOutline: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: The Princess Bride
plotOutline: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Clueless
plotOutline: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

image_url: movie-covers/Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones.jpg
title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
plotOutline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

title: Grown Ups
plotOutline: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

image_url: movie-covers/Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens.jpg
title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
plotOutline: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

title: You've Got Mail
plotOutline: Book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet, both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

image_url: movie-covers/Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith.jpg
title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
plotOutline: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, while Anakin is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot to rule the galaxy.

title: Pretty Woman
plotOutline: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plotOutline: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Fool's Gold
plotOutline: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

title: About Time
plotOutline: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: Ford v Ferrari
plotOutline: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Enchanted
plotOutline: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

image_url: movie-covers/How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.jpg
title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
plotOutline: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.
